WRITING.TEXT:
Out of curiosity, I googled `"sin cos cos sin cos cos sin sin"` and think my teacher was trying to help us remember:
sin(A+B) = sin A cos B + cos A sin B cos(A+B) = cos A cos B + sin A sin B
sin(A-B) = sin A cos B - cos A sin B cos(A-B) = cos A cos B + sin A sin B
Been so long since calculus...
"sin cos cos sin cos cos sin sin" to the melody of twinkle twinkle little star. Doesn't even give me the whole formula...

I told her that we should both keep looking and if either of us finds someone else better, then we'd go separate ways. Neither of us have, sad. Is she better than nothing? Meh... Probably should get out more...

"issues" in my above post being an understatement. No idea why I put up with all her shit, even when she can't put up with her own. Perhaps I like project women, idk. But my efforts with her feel futile if she's constantly lying to herself. I think it's her attempts to work out with me, to try to be someone she's not, but it's not helping. Like you say, I should just move on and find someone better, recognizing it for what it is: something that just isn't working out and probably will never work out.

Mike Tyson, then I could live my life saying I got a shot in against one of the most famous boxers of all time. He's a boxer we can all agree deserves a punch in the face for the whole ear biting incident too.

I'm in a similar boat with my ex. I used to have strong feelings for her, then they just shrunk until I felt nothing but pain. Wish I could bring myself to like her again, just every time I try to do that, she does something that ticks me off like text me when I'm at work and mention how her boring day was, and some issues she's having followed by an "ilu". Like wtf, even when I've complained about it. Probably a never unless she can stop smothering me and get her shit together so I can develop feelings for her again. Not happening...
